name: Don't Leave a Mark
description:
This game was created by me, Nick Smith, and my fiancee, Cassandra Foreman. I wrote the code and she drew the pretty pictures.

The game was made with godot, aseprite, and GIMP. All sound assets were acquired through Creative Commons.

This game follows Marvin, a man who just wants his cat to stop using his floor as her personal litterbox. Help Marvin move Lizzie to the litterbox before he loses his entire security deposit!

I'd like to personally thank OpenJam for being such an amazing first game jam experience and I look forward to competing again.

Find the source at: https://github.com/ndsmith3/Dont-Leave-A-Mark
